page.title: 20Life on a farm
page.content: About 2 months ago we moved to North Common Farm. It is very nice there. During the last few weeks we have been making silage.They have cut 5 fields now, and they have just finished.They cover black material over the silage and after that they stick this black tape on it.After they have done that they have to cover a load of tyres all over it so it won't blow off.On our farm we have horses, chickens, rabbits, guinea_pigs, dogs, puppys, cows, calves and pigs. we had 3 full pigsties of pigs, but we sold them all except one because its leg was very bad. Sometimes I get the eggs from the chickens and we get at least 4 or 5 buckets of eggs from the chickens a day.
